html:
Romance isn’t a huge component of Assassin’s Creed Shadows, but it does exist. You’ll naturally come across some romance options in the main story and via companion missions. Romance, then, is just a matter of knowing what to say — and when to say it.

In this Assassin’s Creed Shadows guide, we’ll cover how romance works, followed by a list of all romance options and details of how to romance them.

Update (April 1): Not joking — we’ve added one more romance option.

Table of Contents

  • How romance works in Assassin's Creed Shadows
  • Can you romance multiple characters in Assassin's Creed Shadows?
  • All Assassin's Creed Shadows romance options for Naoe and Yasuke
  • How to romance Gennojo (Naoe)
  • How to romance Katsuhime (Naoe)
  • How to romance Kochiro (Naoe)
  • How to romance Mayu (Naoe)
  • How to romance Lady Oichi (Yasuke)
  • How to romance Hori Hidemasa (Yasuke)
  • How to romance Ibuki (Yasuke)
  • How to romance Rin (Yasuke)

How romance works in Assassin’s Creed Shadows

Image: Ubisoft Quebec/Ubisoft via Polygon

Assassin’s Creed Shadows handles romance in a quite straightforward manner. In order to establish a romantic relationship with a character, you must basically follow their questlines.

From the first time you meet said characters, dialogue options with romantic connotations are available for you to choose from — they are indicated by a heart icon (see above). Although only picking these options in conversations doesn’t appear obligatory to become more intimate with them, it’s important to focus on them if you don’t want to risk losing each romance option.

As you complete quests related to these characters and continue to choose flirtatious dialogue options, eventually a dialogue option with a heart crossed by an arrow appears. Choosing it makes your relationship official.

Reaching this stage in your relationship is followed by an intimate scene featuring these characters, but don’t worry: These scenes aren’t too explicit.

Can you romance multiple characters in Assassin’s Creed Shadows?

Image: Ubisoft Quebec/Ubisoft via Polygon

As far as we can tell, there are no negative repercussions to romancing more than one character at once.

The romanceable characters don’t interact with each other, and we haven’t seen a quest where the nature of your relationship with them is discussed. In any case, as far as we can tell, being in a romantic relationship with more than one character is only a matter for Naoe since she’s the only one who has more than one option.

All Assassin’s Creed Shadows romance options for Naoe and Yasuke

Below, based on a playthrough that was completed through the main story, you find all the romanceable characters in Assassin’s Creed Shadows, with the character who can romance them in parentheses.

  • Gennojo (Naoe)
  • Katsuhime (Naoe)
  • Koshiro (Naoe)
  • Mayu (Naoe)
  • Lady Oichi (Yasuke)
  • Hori Hidemasa (Yasuke)
  • Ibuki (Yasuke)
  • Rin (Yasuke)

Some of these characters are also recruited as companions, but don’t worry. Following their romantic route does not affect your capacity to recruit them as allies. Below, we’ll get into how to romance these characters, with key steps for each romance path in bold font.

How to romance Gennojo (Naoe)

Image: Ubisoft Quebec/Ubisoft via Polygon

Gennojo is the first of Naoe’s love interests to appear in the game. He is a bold thief who you meet during one of the missions you must complete while hunting down the Fool during the main story.

In case you want to make him one of Naoe’s lovers, here are the quests and steps you must follow:

Missing Missive

  • You can’t miss this quest since it’s part of the main story arc.
  • Fight Gennojo and retrieve the letter he stole.

Sake and Swords

  • Meet with Gennojo, who’s drunk and selling items he stole in Yamashiro.
  • When talking to him, go with the “Depends what you’re offering” dialogue option.
  • In the final conversation, pick the “Show me, thief” answer.

Honor Among Thieves

  • For this quest, meet Gennojo in Kyoto.
  • Complete the quest by invading and robbing the scroll he tells you about.
  • Before the mission ends, talk to him and choose the “I’m keeping it, then” response.

Stolen Hearts

  • Again, meet Gennojo in Kyoto. Find him northwest of Hills of Meeting.
  • The dialogue option “I’m here for you” is the one you should pick during the first interaction with him in this quest.
  • Later, go with “I’d like to embrace you.”

How to romance Katsuhime (Naoe)

Image: Ubisoft Quebec/Ubisoft via Polygon

Daughter of the leader of another shinobi clan, Katsuhime is a proud fighter whose faith in her teppo is as strong and sincere as the words that come out of her mouth. Her temper is similar to Naoe’s, which causes a little bit of tension in the air during their first interactions. Even so, she seems to trust Naoe enough to share her ideas and feelings.

Here are all the quests where you must pick the right dialogue choices to develop Naoe’s relationship with Katsuhime.

Showdown in Sakamoto

  • This is the final quest related to the Naginata target.
  • During the infiltration into the Sakamoto Castle, you follow Katsuhime for some time.
  • When talking to her, choose the “I like your teppo” dialogue option.

Letter from Katsuhime

  • Katsuhime can be found in The Shimmering Fields in Omi.
  • Help her find some sake in an underground deposit.
  • Eventually, Naoe invites Katsuhime to be part of the league. During this conversation, you must answer her with, “It offers time with me.”

The Tales of Genin

  • This time, meet Katsuhime in Wakasa.
  • You learn more about her while you help Katsuhime check if the family of her former master is okay.
  • Assist her in finding and killing the pirates who attacked the family.
  • In the final talk between Naoe and Katsuhime, go with “I do enjoy your company.”

Diary of Lady Rokkaku

  • Meet Katsuhime in Ado River Valley.
  • You will need to carry her out of a castle to save her life.
  • When talking to her, you should recruit her as a companion by picking the “Yes. Join us” dialogue option.

The Jounin Pillow Book

  • Find Katsuhime in Wakasa close to Jogu Shrine.
  • When they start talking, pick the “Let’s find out” option to express Naoe’s feelings.
  • Lastly, be sure to choose the “Yes. Forever” option.

How to romance Kochiro (Naoe)

Image: Ubisoft Quebec/Ubisoft via Polygon

Kochiro became a ronin and now he looks for a new reason to leave — or a new master to serve. As Naoe helps bring justice to his former companions, Kochiro subtly begins to show affection toward her. His romance route offers a bittersweet and yet romantic moment to Naoe.

Starting Kochiro’s romance route takes a little bit of time, but if you’re up for the challenge, here’s a list of all the quests and steps you must go through:

Brothers in Arms

  • One of the main story missions, it takes you to meet Kochiro while trying to learn more about the Ox.
  • During this quest, you need to help him find his friend Seiji.
  • After confronting Seiji, choose to spare him.

Genzaburo’s Soldiers

  • Koshiro appears on the People of Harima board.
  • It unlocks a new board with five targets. Kill all of them to complete the quest.

The Leaf Turns

  • A while after having talked to Kochiro at the end of the Genzaburo’s Soldiers, this quest will unlock.
  • You need to find him in Kitano Village.
  • When the option appears, choose “You’re more than a blade to me” as your first step to romancing him.
  • Your next step is to retrieve Kochiro’s toolbox which is inside Inariyama Garrison.
  • Once you have the box, go back and find Kochiro in Lover’s Lake.
  • As you talk to him, go with the “We have a special connection” dialogue option.
  • Right after, you must choose the “I’d like to spend more time with you.”
  • Follow Kochiro for a while and when a new conversation begins, choose “You must follow your heart.”
  • Sit beside him and as the conversation progresses, you must choose the “Like me” dialogue option to complete the quest.

How to romance Mayu (Naoe)

Image: Ubisoft Quebec/Ubisoft via Polygon

Like many other characters in Assassin’s Creed Shadows, Mayu’s life was affected by the war. After losing her husband who never returned from battle, she began a journey to find herself again. By inviting Naoe in a quest to honor all Jizo Statues, Mayu finds her way to a new path.

To romance Mayu, you don’t need to go through a long chain of quests. There’s actually only one mission to be complete, but you’ll need to navigate the entire map in order to find the Jizo Statues and make offerings.

Mayu’s Offerings

  • Unlock the quest by talking to Mayu in Gose, Yamato.
  • Honor 10 Jizo Statues and go back to talk to her with Naoe. Choose the “I know that feeling” dialogue option to start flirting with her.
  • Next, you need to honor 35 Jizo Statues to unlock the dialogue. When talking to Mayu, use the option “You can define your own path.”
  • To unlock the final dialogue, you need to have found and honored all 69 Jizo Statues. Once you’re done, go back to Mayu. For help tracking the statues, see our guide to all Jizo Statue locations.
  • During the dialogue, go with “I learned to follow my own intuition” and “Not before I kiss you” to complete the romance route.

How to romance Lady Oichi (Yasuke)

Image: Ubisoft Quebec/Ubisoft via Polygon

Lady Oichi is Oda Nobunaga’s sister and you can go through her romance route as Yasuke. She hides lots of secrets and, different from Naoe’s lovers, whether Yasuke will have the chance to further develop his relationship with her may impact the story.

If you plan on chasing this forbidden love between Yasuke, a samurai, and Lady Oichi, the sister of a daimyo, then here is what you must do.

An Education

  • This is one of Yasuke’s quests in which you can see part of his training.
  • During the quest, Yasuke meets Lady Oichi and talks to her.
  • Choose the “Some company might be nice” dialogue option.

The Wheel Unmasked

  • This is the final quest involving the Mourner, one of the Shinbafuku members.
  • Once you reach the target at the end of the quest, you must choose to spare them.

The Wheel Turns

  • Start this quest by meeting up with Lady Oichi.
  • In one of the first moments talking to her, choose the “I miss your smile” option.
  • Now, you need to meet her at Cat Island, which is in the middle of Lake Biwa in Omi.
  • After talking to her three daughters, you need to choose between leaving a dog with the kids or taking it with you. Regardless of what you choose, it won’t affect the final scene.
  • Next, pick the “Let’s enjoy the moment” dialogue option to make it official.

How to romance Hori Hidemasa (Yasuke)

Image: Ubisoft Quebec/Ubisoft via Polygon

A former retainer under Oda Nobunaga, Hori Hidemasa captures Yasuke’s attention due to his loyalty to the man both of them respected. As Yasuke helps him avenge their daimyo, their relationship becomes more intimate.

In order to unlock the special scene with Hori Hidemasa, you must first help him in this revenge mission which doesn’t leave space for a lot of flirting. Even so, it’s a great quest. Here’s what you must do to unlock his romance route.

The Betrayers

  • Find this quest south of Omi. You must be playing Yasuke when you meet Hori.
  • Talking to Hori unlocks the Betrayers board with seven targets. After killing all of them, go back to Hori to complete the quest.
  • In the final conversation, choose the “Meeting you was my reward” dialogue option.

How to romance Ibuki (Yasuke)

Image: Ubisoft Quebec/Ubisoft via Polygon

Now a ronin, Ibuki travels trying to make the world a better place by helping those in need, while looking with understanding eyes at those who had their hands forced by life to take a knife and steal from others.

Yasuke enjoys hearing them talking about art and beauty. Thus, if you plan on helping Yasuke to make Ibuki feel welcomed and loved, follow the steps below to unlock their romance route.

Ambush Interrupted

  • You can find this quest in Iga, South of Hijiyama, in a place called Kashiwara Village.
  • To start this quest, you must be playing Yasuke.
  • Meet Ibuki and help them defend the civilians.

Homecoming

  • Meet Ibuki in North of Hijiyama.
  • When talking to them, choose the “I am here to help” dialogue option.
  • Enter the Hijiyama Fort and fight your way to the highest section where you find Ibuki’s brother, Kyobei.
  • To make this romance route progress, pick the “Fight with us, Kyobei” dialogue option after finding him.
  • Leave the first and go meet Ibuki sitting by themselves Southeast of Hijiyama.
  • During the conversation that begins at this point, go with “Your mind works in beautiful ways.”
  • The next morning, you must recruit them to be your ally.

Putting Down Roots

  • Go meet Ibuki in the Hideout.
  • Talk to Ibuki and answer them with “You have lovely eyes.”
  • To help Yasuke make his move, you need to gather flower seeds.
  • You can find them crossing the bridge East of Katshiware Fort in Hijiyama.
  • With all the seeds with you, go back and talk to Ibuki.
  • Your final answer must be “I want more than friendship” to unlock the romance scene.

How to romance Rin (Yasuke)

Image: Ubisoft Quebec/Ubisoft via Polygon

Rin is a woman who you initially meet in Gobo, a place in the Kii region, close to the Sazae Oni Shores. She is looking for warriors to help the village fight bandits who have been attacking them every winter. At the same time, Rin is looking for an opportunity to become stronger and learn how to fight by herself.

You can only romance Rin as Yasuke since their relationship begins with him being her teacher. If you’re interested in pursuing her route, here are all the steps you must go through.

The Winter Raiders

  • This is the quest that introduces Rin and unlocks her own chain of missions.
  • You find this quest in Gobo, Southern of Kii. The place is close to the coast, south of Sazae Oni Shores.
  • Although this quest unlocks a new board of targets, you don’t need to kill them in order to advance Rin’s quests.

Arrow Strike

  • To start this quest, meet Rin West of Kumano Nachi Taisha shrines in her grandfather’s hut.
  • At the beginning of the conversation, you must choose the “Let me help you clean” dialogue option.
  • Next, shoot all the targets and when you talk to Rin pick the “It wasn’t my archery you were testing” option.

War Horse

  • To unlock this quest, you must have completed Arrow Strike and wait for the season to change.
  • Return to Rin, who is in the same area she was during the previous quest.
  • After following her around and helping Rin to rescue a horse, you need to ride alongside her to a waterfall.
  • You need to answer “You excel at everything you try” when Yasuke and Rin start talking.

Ride into Town

  • Just like it happened with War Horse, Ride into Town will only become available – and appear on the map – once the season changes.
  • You need to meet Rin in her hut, but when you get there, you must fight a few bandits.
  • Follow Rin until you are back in the city and talk to a merchant.
  • When the merchant offers a free onigiri, be sure to pick the “Plum onigiri, please” dialogue option.
  • Later, go with “I want to draw a picture of you.”
  • The final answer to unlocking the intimate moment between Yasuke and Rin is “I would like to kiss you.”
